p: In another study consistent alterations in myelin-associated oligodendrocyte basic protein (MAOBP) and huntingtin interacting protein 1 (HIP1) DNA methylation status were described in MSA patients [ 52, 53]. In particular, reduced MOBP mRNA levels correlated with elevated DNA methylation in MSA patients. A distinct association between the methylation of HIP1 DNA and gene expression levels has been found in MSA patients compared to healthy controls [ 52]. These results propose that this locus is subjected to epigenetic remodeling in MSA.
